short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 10 Pressure Sensor Switches to be delivered by 31 March 2023.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.The delivery is requested at Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 2E9, no later than 31 March 2023.",
duration_in_months: We are requesting quotes for a duration of approximately 10 months. Please note that this will be a continuous sale, if and when requirements are met.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Pressure Sensor Switch
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-237322/B
#### Publication Date: October 25, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: November 9, 2022, 2:00 pm EST
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Amendment Date: October 26, 2022

The Department of National Defence invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of Pressure Sensor Switches, as outlined below.

**Contract Requirements:**

The Department of National Defence requires:

* 10 units of Pressure Sensor Switches, with the following specifications:
	+ GSIN: N5930
	+ NSN: 5930-01-395-1713
	+ Switch, Pressure, Part No.: 250959.02.5.241, P10M-129, or PS250959-02
	+ NSCM/CAGE: 35181, 14314, or 35181
* The items listed above are not subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

**Tender Submission Requirements:**

* Proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Bidders who propose an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the part numbers and NSCM/CAGE they are offering, and provide a Certificate of Conformance from the OEM.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:
Diego Vacca
diego.vacca@forces.gc.ca

**Documents:**

For a detailed description of the tender and evaluation criteria, please refer to the attached documents:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/8d46c5a7422385715bdd012a0570e47d/rfp_w8485-237322-b_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/8c92ad1febda9ecf03ae7db4d043a351/rfp_w8485-237322-b_fr.pdf

Note: This is a request for proposal (RFP) with an open bidding process.

---

Required Information:

* The request for a consultant/contractor to manufacture a batch of units in Pressure Sensor Switch using given NSN.
* A government contract for a different item is also included. But that is a separate tender
